scripts.deploy:test-integral:holesky: pnpm prepare:deploy holesky test-integral && pnpm codegen && graph deploy metrom-test-integral-holesky -l 0.0.32
scripts.deploy:silverswap:sonic: pnpm prepare:deploy sonic silverswap && pnpm codegen && 0xgraph deploy metrom-silverswap-sonic -l 0.0.7
scripts.deploy:fibonacci:form: pnpm prepare:deploy form fibonacci && pnpm codegen && graph deploy metrom-fibonacci-form -l 0.0.8 --node https://formapi.0xgraph.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://formapi.0xgraph.xyz/ipfs
